person.persName: Matthew S. Preston (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Melvina J. Preston. Father of Ann C. Preston, John S. Preston, Rufus B. Preston, and Smith Butler Preston. Farmer in Ballard County in 1850 and 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in 1860.
